main event: Witness reported observing three stationary objects in the sky on March 30, 1967, which initially appeared as a fuzzy red-orange disc and glowed brightly before changing colors.
interesting points: The object had vapor trails that changed colors,The object was compared in brightness to that of a star but was significantly brighter,Witness described hearing a beautiful glow with no sound coming from the object,It was reported to have suddenly shot up at an almost straight angle and disappeared unexpectedly,Multiple reports of similar observations were noted in the surrounding areas.
sighted object: three glowing objects emitting vapor trails
witness description: An individual who was outside when the observation was made.
